string.text: Do not attack before I give the order - no itchy trigger fingers.
Victory!!! If you're alive, on me! Marked One, get over here - we need to talk.
Great, Marked One. I'm glad you're alive and decided to pay us a visit. Come over and we'll have a chat. There's a little something coming up.
Excellent, your task is complete. Safe to say you've learned the basic skills OK.
Marked One, the way to the camp is now open to you. Come over and we'll talk.

About Sharpshooter, Marked One. Some stalker just came back from a long raid. Fox he's called. Looks like he had a pretty rough time - he's asking for help. Some weird creatures followed him all the way back, he says he won't hold out much longer. I reckon the fella will know a bit about Sharpshooter. You might wanna hurry up though, here are the co-ordinates.
You screwed up, Marked One. The boys died although that ain't your fault. These things happen in the Zone. Anyway, you passed the test so get back here and we'll talk business.
Good man, Marked One. You carry this on and you'll make yourself a few friends. Pay me a visit and we'll talk business.
Well, that wasn't a smart move, Marked One. You passed the test but you're gonna have to deal with Wolf and his goons on your own. Anyways, I'm waiting for you, we got some work to discuss.

Marked One, the military dug up some cool stuff in Agroprom research institute. I'm interested in it and you probably are too. Get the info and take it to the barman in the stalker's bar. Get to work!
Careful! You're right next to the anomalies. Use your bolts to work out their exact location and shape.

Press Contact ($$ACTION_CONTACTS$$). You can see people within 250 metres of you who have turned their PDAs on in contacts and on your visor minimap. You can also see their attitude towards you. Pay attention if enemies appear although bandits and mutants (ha-ha) don't normally turn their PDAs on, so watch it!
To activate the map press '$$ACTION_MAP$$'.
To activate the PDA press '$$ACTION_ACTIVE_JOBS$$'.
To talk to someone aim at them and press '$$ACTION_USE$$'.
Find the artifact in the area marked on the map and take it to the trader.
Marked One, pay attention - it could be you next time.
Give this moron a medkit.

Marked One! Forget the artifact, drop it off later. Run to the trailer by the road, my boys need help there. The idiots had the great idea of shooting at a passing chopper. I've sent you the co-ordinates.
Search the bodies - you might find something useful.
